comments.body:
Eric,  thank you for the review.

I believe the code is correct, but please double check my logic. 

C strptime() takes a Cstring src uses a Cstring format to convert 
the string into a C tm.  Then the next line copies the C tm 
to a scalanative_tm, which gets passed back to the Scala caller.

I can add a short comment on the sn_tm_init() line if you can suggest one.
Or I can correct a grievous error if he same person who wrote the code
is blind to his own mistake.  I certainly do not want to be publishing flaws.
